data.text: Nan borim, gumazitam gumazir igharazitam da puram an bizim ini, egh tɨghar uam a ikarvagham, ezɨ nɨ a ko akam akɨrigha gɨvagha ghaze,
Nɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam nɨrara ikiagharɨki,
Nan borim, nɨ gumazir kamɨn apengan itima, a nɨ ikiagharɨki. Kamaghɨn nɨ iver kam zuamɨram an azenim girɨgh.
Nɨ avughsɨ dakusɨ nɨghnɨghan markɨ,
Nɨ iver kam fɨrigh,
Ia gumazir amɨraziba, kɨ kamaghɨn ia mɨkɨmasa.
Sibaba, da gumazir dapaniba ko
Ezɨ dagher avɨriba itir dughiamɨn, sibaba dagheba akufi,
Nɨ gumazir amɨrazim, nɨ dughiar ruarimɨn akui.
Ezɨ nɨ ghaze, “A dera, kɨ tong dakuigham.
Nɨ kamaghɨn damutɨ, nɨn biziba ko dagheba zuamɨra gɨvaghtɨ, nɨ gumazir onganarazibagh amim mɨn otogham.
Gumazir kuraba puram arua
Egha me deraghavɨra uan akabar bighavɨra mɨgeir puvatɨ.
Egha me zurara navimɨn aven ifavarir nɨghnɨzibagh amua arazir kurabar amuasa nɨghnɨsi,
Eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir ekiam zuamɨra me batogham, egh me gasɨghasigham.
Ikiavɨra Itir God 7plan arazir kurar kabar amuan anogoregha
Gumazir uabɨ uabɨ fem, gumazir igharazibar gara ghaze,
Gumazir arazir kuram damuasa nɨghnɨzim.
Gumazir kotiamɨn aven ifavarir akabav geim.
Nan borim, nɨ uan afeziam ko amebamɨn akar gavgaviba baragh,
Nɨ aningɨn akaba inigh uan navim datɨgh, egh zurara dar gɨn mangɨ,
Nɨ daruamin dughiamɨn, akar kam tuavim nɨn akakagham.
Akar Gavgavir kaba, mati lamɨn angazangarim, tuavim nɨn akakagham.
Aningɨn akaba nɨn akurvaghtɨ,
Nɨ amizir munamɨn mɨkarzir ganganir aghuimɨn ganɨva a gakongan markɨ.

Gumazitam tuavimɨn amizim koma akua arazir kuram gami, a ivezir ekiam damuan kogham, mati dagher muziarimɨn ivezim.6:26 Hibrun akam deragha akar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Gumazir maba akam gɨgha ghaze, “Egh nɨ zurara tuavimɨn amizim bagha arui, nɨ uan biziba bar da tegh egh onganarazir gumazim mɨn ikiam.”
Nɨ avim uan evarim boroghɨn an suiraghtɨ,
Nɨ avim gisɨn darutɨ,
Kamaghɨra, nɨ gumazir igharazimɨn amuim ko dakuightɨ,
Gumazitam mɨtiriam an aghɨtɨ a daghetam okemeghtɨ,
Me bizir an amizir kamɨn apighɨva a isɨ kotiam datɨghtɨ,
Ezɨ gumazim, gumazir igharazimɨn amuim koma akui, a bar derazir puvatɨgha egha bar ongani.
Gumazamiziba a mɨsoghɨva akar kurabar a mɨkɨmɨva an ziam gasɨghasɨgham,
E fo, gumazim, gumazir igharazimɨn amuim koma akui, an osɨmtɨzir ekiam gami.
An arazir kurar kam ikarvaghamin dagɨatam inian aghuagham.
